title: DSPy Phase 4: Optimization Pipeline
description: Systematic prompt optimization for all DSPy modules using MIPROv2 and GEPA. Includes training data collection, performance baselines, optimization runs, and A/B testing.
notes: Phase 4 COMPLETE (2025-11-03). v1 optimization finished: per-signature optimization using MIPROv2. Results: extract_requirements 36.7%→56.0% (+52.4%), validate_intent 100%→100% (perfect), validate_completeness/correctness/guidance stagnant (need more training data). Infrastructure 100% complete: Phase 5 (Rust module loader, A/B testing framework, telemetry/metrics, rollback strategy) ✅, Phase 6 (production logger, continuous optimization pipeline) ✅, Phase 7 (comprehensive testing: 145+ tests, 80% coverage across 4 test suites) ✅, Phase 8 (documentation: TESTING.md, DSPY_MIGRATION_GUIDE.md, OPERATIONS.md, CODE_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md) ✅. PRODUCTION-READY. Optional improvement (Phases 2-3): expand training data 20→50 examples for stagnant signatures, re-optimize with 50 trials. See docs/DSPY_INTEGRATION.md, docs/TESTING.md, docs/OPERATIONS.md, docs/CODE_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md.

title: SpecFlow Phase 3: Interactive Workflow
description: Complete specification workflow with slash commands, interactive clarifications, Beads integration, and end-to-end testing. Enables full spec-driven development workflow.

title: DSPy + SpecFlow Integration
description: Integrate DSPy modules with Specification Workflow: use Reviewer for spec validation, Optimizer for task generation, and Memory Evolution for spec consolidation.

title: SF-1: Complete Clarification parsing - Implement from_markdown() for round-trip serialization
SF-2: Implement /feature-specify slash command - Create spec from natural language
SF-3: Implement /feature-clarify slash command - Interactive Q&A for ambiguities
SF-4: Implement /feature-plan slash command - Generate implementation plan from spec
DS-1: Create ReviewerModule training data - 20+ labeled examples for intent validation
DS-5: Establish performance baselines - Measure latency, token usage, cost for all modules
INT-1: Use ReviewerModule to validate feature specs - Integration with SpecFlow
DS-2: Create SemanticModule training data - 20+ labeled examples for discourse, contradictions, pragmatics
DS-3: Create OptimizerModule training data - 20+ labeled examples for skill discovery
SF-5: Implement /feature-tasks slash command - Break down plan into Beads issues

title: SF-6: Implement /feature-checklist slash command - Interactive task execution
SF-7: Beads export integration - Export tasks from plan
DS-6: MIPROv2 optimization - Optimize ReviewerModule prompts
notes: RESOLVED: Per-signature optimization approach successfully fixed composite_metric bug. Results: extract_requirements 36.7%→56.0% (+52.4% improvement), validate_intent 100%→100%, validate_completeness 75%→75%, validate_correctness 75%→75%, generate_guidance 50%→50%. Aggregated module saved to reviewer_optimized_v1.json. User's skepticism about zero improvement was correct - critical bug discovery enabled real gains.

title: INT-2: OptimizerModule discovers skills - Integration with skill system
Expand training data for stagnant signatures (20→50 examples)
Re-optimize stagnant signatures with expanded training data (50 trials)
Deploy DSPy infrastructure to staging environment
Monitor production metrics for 7 days (success rate, latency, cost)
